title: Did ‘Antifa’ Recruit Protesters on Craigslist in Nebraska?
subtitle: “We are ANTIFA, and we're willing to pay up to 1,000 people $25 per hour for protester,” one ad allegedly said.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: “Antifa” posted an ad on the Lincoln, Nebraska, Craigslist website offering to pay protesters “to cause as much chaos and destruction as possible.”
